Posts.Content: hi,  i just finished 3 t and main thing was very tired and by last one very tearfull and low.but it has passed now so dont worry, i start fec part on friday and that seems so much worse from what i have read, am so on edge . love to all.
Posts.Title: T Tips Please

Posts.Content: hi there,  yes i have same and its just one eye! lucky you to be on final chemo well done. i have three fec left so at least half way .sure eye thing will clear up after chemo wears off.  hip hip no more chemo for you xx
Posts.Title: Watery Eyes :(

Posts.Content: hi,  thanks for saying fec will be a doddle its what i need to hear! lol and wow you lucky lady last chemo tuesday i love seeing them words. well done . think i had docetaxol first as i had to have some heart tests befor the fec.  did you say last chemo!!!! lol . hugs xx
Posts.Title: Watery Eyes :(

Posts.Content: hi there,  just wanted to say how unfair this breast cancer is, but you must be so strong to get through it all again, well done so far. and sure all the rest will go well for you .sorry no help tp you but just wanted to send hug aswell xxxxxx
